verses.verse: Let as many <S%G3745><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> as are <S%G1526><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the yoke <S%G2218><s%> count <S%G2233><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> masters <S%G1203><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his doctrine <S%G1319><s%> be not <S%G3361><s%> blasphemed. <S%G987><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they that have <S%G2192><s%> believing <S%G4103><s%> masters, <S%G1203><s%> let them not <S%G3361><s%> despise <S%G2706><s%> them, because <S%G3754><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> brethren; <S%G80><s%> but <S%G235><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> do them service, <S%G1398><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> partakers <S%G482><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> benefit. <S%G2108><s%> These things <S%G5023><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> exhort. <S%G3870><s%>

If any man <S%G1536><s%> teach otherwise, <S%G2085><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> consent <S%G4334><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to wholesome <S%G5198><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> even the words <S%G3588><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%> which is according <S%G2596><s%> to godliness; <S%G2150><s%>

He is proud, <S%G5187><s%> knowing <S%G1987><s%> nothing, <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G235><s%> doting <S%G3552><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> questions <S%G2214><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strifes of words, <S%G3055><s%> whereof <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3739><s%> cometh <S%G1096><s%> envy, <S%G5355><s%> strife, <S%G2054><s%> railings, <S%G988><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> surmisings. <S%G5283><s%>

Perverse disputings <S%G3859><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> of corrupt <S%G1311><s%> minds, <S%G3563><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> destitute <S%G650><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> supposing <S%G3543><s%> that gain <S%G4200><s%> is <S%G1511><s%> godliness: <S%G2150><s%> from <S%G575><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> withdraw thyself. <S%G868><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> contentment <S%G841><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> gain. <S%G4200><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we brought <S%G1533><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> this world, <S%G2889><s%> and it is certain <S%G1212><s%> <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G3761><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> carry nothing out. <S%G1627><s%> <S%G5100><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> food <S%G1305><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> raiment <S%G4629><s%> let us be therewith content. <S%G714><s%> <S%G5125><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> they that will <S%G1014><s%> be rich <S%G4147><s%> fall <S%G1706><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> temptation <S%G3986><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a snare, <S%G3803><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> into many <S%G4183><s%> foolish <S%G453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hurtful <S%G983><s%> lusts, <S%G1939><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> drown <S%G1036><s%> men <S%G444><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> destruction <S%G3639><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> perdition. <S%G684><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> love of money <S%G5365><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the root <S%G4491><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> evil: <S%G2556><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> while some <S%G5100><s%> coveted after, <S%G3713><s%> they have erred <S%G635><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pierced themselves through <S%G4044><s%> <S%G1438><s%> with many <S%G4183><s%> sorrows. <S%G3601><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> thou, <S%G4771><s%> O <S%G5599><s%> man <S%G444><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> these things; <S%G5023><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> follow after <S%G1377><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> godliness, <S%G2150><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> patience, <S%G5281><s%> meekness. <S%G4236><s%>

Fight <S%G75><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fight <S%G73><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> lay hold on <S%G1949><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> thou art also <S%G2532><s%> called, <S%G2564><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hast professed <S%G3670><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> profession <S%G3671><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> witnesses. <S%G3144><s%>

I give thee charge <S%G3853><s%> <S%G4671><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who quickeneth <S%G2227><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> before Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who before <S%G1909><s%> Pontius <S%G4194><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> witnessed <S%G3140><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> confession; <S%G3671><s%>

That thou <S%G4571><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> this commandment <S%G1785><s%> without spot, <S%G784><s%> unrebukable, <S%G423><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> appearing <S%G2015><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> in his <S%G2398><s%> times <S%G2540><s%> he shall show, <S%G1166><s%> who is the <S%G3588><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> Potentate, <S%G1413><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of kings, <S%G936><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> of lords; <S%G2961><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> immortality, <S%G110><s%> dwelling <S%G3611><s%> in the light <S%G5457><s%> which no man can approach unto; <S%G676><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G444><s%> hath seen, <S%G1492><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> see: <S%G1492><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> be honor <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G2904><s%> everlasting. <S%G166><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Charge <S%G3853><s%> them that are rich <S%G4145><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this world, <S%G3568><s%> <S%G165><s%> that they be not highminded; <S%G5309><s%> <S%G3361><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> trust <S%G1679><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> uncertain <S%G83><s%> riches, <S%G4149><s%> but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who giveth <S%G3930><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> richly <S%G4146><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> enjoy; <S%G619><s%>

That they do good, <S%G14><s%> that they be rich <S%G4147><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> <S%G1511><s%> ready to distribute, <S%G2130><s%> willing to communicate; <S%G2843><s%>

Laying up in store <S%G597><s%> for themselves <S%G1438><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> foundation <S%G2310><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time to come, <S%G3195><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may lay hold on <S%G1949><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

O <S%G5599><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> that which is committed to thy trust, <S%G3872><s%> avoiding <S%G1624><s%> profane <S%G952><s%> and vain babblings, <S%G2757><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> oppositions <S%G477><s%> of science <S%G1108><s%> falsely so called: <S%G5581><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> professing <S%G1861><s%> have erred <S%G795><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> thee. <S%G4675><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
